data.text: @kerrywcampbell You've linked loosening of restrictions with right wing ideology. You may want to examine your confirmation bias. We're all struggling with it to some degree, but covid can't be viewed in a public health vacuum anymore

@kerrywcampbell What's your plan Kerry?  Lock down for how long?  4 vaccines?  5?  It's here, it's staying, and if our health system is keeping up, that's the path forward and always was the path forward. Vaccination status is high.  If not now when?
@BrentChaisson @kerrywcampbell He's trying to make a case for restrictions... For a flu...🤦‍♂️

@kerrywcampbell Well why won't the gov do something about it instead of worrying about getting 4 cruize ships here in April the tourism people are worried about losing revenue I can see that but what good is it if we are all on hospital
@kerrywcampbell @Tim_Banks A business can close and people still live... a person can't un die
@kerrywcampbell Rest easy it’s all under control and it was expected. Good news that soon there will be no news to worry about.
@candysshadow @kerrywcampbell I wouldn't be surprised,  have seen alot of cfw vehicles and people I don't  recognize
@kerrywcampbell Three of us were watching Compass tonight. We all agreed that this was first time not seeing u in a shirt and tie.  Looking good Mr. Campbell!!

@kerrywcampbell @candysshadow @FurnessColin The UK Guardian recently did a great article on the increase in disability cases in the overall working age population- they now have a “lingering” health crises.  The long term cost to the health system and the economy needs to be considered- not just immediate hospital rates.
